select_fritzbox.title: Select FRITZ!Box
select_fritzbox.no_fritzes: Please configure the FRITZ!Box settings on the setting page of the app.

enter_credentials.title: Enter FRITZ!Box credentials
enter_credentials.description: Please enter the credentials of a user that has priveleges to see the Home Automation section of this FRITZ!Box.
enter_credentials.invalid_credentials: The credentials are either invalid, the user doesn't have rights to access Fritz home automation or the FRITZ!Box is unavailabe.
